001package imagingbook.common.mser;
002
003import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
004import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
005import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogHide;
006import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
007import imagingbook.common.mser.components.ComponentTree.Method;
008import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
009
010/**
011 * Parameters for MSER detection. Instances of this class may be placed inside a
012 * {@link GenericDialog} using
013 * {@link DialogUtils#addToDialog(ParameterBundle, ij.gui.GenericDialog)}.
014 */
015public class MserParameters implements ParameterBundle<MserDetector> {
016        //{@link DialogUtils#addToDialog(ParameterBundle<?>, GenericDialog)}
017        @DialogLabel("Component tree method")
018        public Method method = Method.LinearTime;
019        
020        @DialogLabel("Delta")
021        public int delta = 5;                                                   // = \Delta
022        
023        @DialogLabel("Min component size (pixels)")
024        public int minAbsComponentArea = 3;
025        
026        @DialogLabel("Min rel. component size")
027        public double minRelCompSize = 0.0001;          // = \alpha_{\min}
028        
029        @DialogLabel("Max rel. component size")
030        public double maxRelCompSize = 0.25;            // = \alpha_{\max}
031        
032        @DialogLabel("Max component size variation")
033        public double maxSizeVariation = 0.25;
034        
035        @DialogLabel("Min component diversity")
036        public double minDiversity = 0.50;
037        
038        @DialogLabel("Constrain ellipse size")
039        public boolean constrainEllipseSize = true;
040        
041        @DialogLabel("Min region compactness")
042        public double minCompactness = 0.2;
043        
044        @DialogLabel("Validate component tree")@DialogHide
045        public boolean validateComponentTree = false;
046}
